entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expression.Assign vs Reflection inconsistent behavior for get- and init-only properties #79799
  • In .NET 6, when ConfigureLogging SetMinimumLevel to LogLevel.Warning/Error/Critical, logger.IsEnabled(LogLevel.Warning/Error/Critical) can't get result rightly. #79798
    Future
  • Why public class SortedDictionary<,>.KeyValuePairComparer is not public? #79797
  • Latest 6.0 SDK/Runtime Docker images segmentation fault on ARM64 #79796
  • Vector{128|256}.IsHardwareAccelerated return false when read via reflection #79795

PullRequests

Created

  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections

Merged

  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Add support for delegate GDV in R2R and NAOT #77267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Create live publishing workflow #79775
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
